remarks: Right multiplication by a lifted scalar is the same as the scalar operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2015.)
statement:
asclmul1.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` W ) $.
asclmul1.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
asclmul1.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
asclmul1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
asclmul1.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` W ) $.
asclmul1.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
asclmul2 $p |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> ( X .X. ( A ` R ) ) = ( R .x. X ) ) $.
